import React, {useEffect, useRef} from 'react'; import { Phone, Mail, MapPin, Clock, MessageCircle, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin } from 'lucide-react'; import EnquiryForm from './EnquiryForm'; const Contact = ({ activeSection }) => { const contactRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { if (activeSection === 'contact' && contactRef.current) { contactRef.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } }, [activeSection]); const contactInfo = [ { icon: , title: 'Call Us', content: '+91 9876543210', subContent: 'Mon-Sat 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM', action: 'tel:+919876543210' }, { icon: , title: 'Email Us', content: 'info@solarsquare.in', subContent: 'Get response within 24 hours', action: 'mailto:info@solarsquare.in' }, { icon: , title: 'Visit Us', content: 'Mumbai, Maharashtra', subContent: 'Corporate Office', action: null }, { icon: , title: 'WhatsApp', content: '+91 9876543210', subContent: 'Quick chat support', action: 'https://wa.me/919876543210' } ]; const socialLinks = [ { icon: , url: '#', name: 'Facebook' }, { icon: , url: '#', name: 'Twitter' }, { icon: , url: '#', name: 'Instagram' }, { icon: , url: '#', name: 'LinkedIn' } ]; const officeHours = [ { day: 'Monday - Friday', time: '9:00 AM - 7:00 PM' }, { day: 'Saturday', time: '9:00 AM - 5:00 PM' }, { day: 'Sunday', time: 'Emergency calls only' } ]; return (

))}

); }; export default Contact;
